name: D-List Diva
storyline:
Until recently, Davina Diamondes was a superstar. But ever since her ‘controversy’, the venues have been getting smaller, the crowds thinner, and the budget tighter. She’s lost her entourage, and the record label has assigned you, a booze-swilling, animal-hating misanthrope named Bill, to be her new tour manager.

In this free comedy point-and-click adventure – created in two weeks for the $107 Adventure Game Challenge – help Bill gather everything he needs to meet the fallen celebrity’s watered-down rider demands, while failing to mask his contempt for everyone he meets along the way.
summary: A free comedy point-and-click adventure game about a misanthropic tour manager and a washed-up singer's rider demands
